about.title: LE KLUTCH
about.subtitle: Where Champions Are Made
about.description: LE KLUTCH, inspired by the French 'le clutch', embodies the essence of that pivotal moment in tennis. On our pristine courts, every swing has the potential to be the game-changer, the heartbeat of an epic match. We believe in empowering every player to seize their LE KLUTCH moment, both on and off the court. Join us in crafting your tennis legacy, where passion meets precision in every serve, volley, and smash.

questions.question: Court Usage Rules
answer: For safety reasons, a maximum of two players are allowed on a court at any given time
Players must wear appropriate sports attire and non-marking tennis shoes on the court. Footwear that doesn't meet our venue regulations is not permitted
Chewing gum, food, and drinks (except water) are strictly prohibited on the courts

questions.question: Booking Policy
answer: To minimize disruptions, entry to lessons is not permitted 15 minutes after the scheduled start time
Online bookings close 6 hours before the lesson start time. For last-minute bookings within this 6-hour window, please call us or contact our LINE customer service to check availability

questions.question: Package Terms
answer: Lesson packages are valid from the date of purchase
Packages are non-transferable and non-shareable. One-time full transfers are allowed for a NT$400 fee (excluding trial packages)
Refunds are available if you're unable to attend, subject to a NT$400 processing fee. Used lessons will be deducted at the full single lesson rate
One-time extensions may be granted for qualifying reasons with proper documentation
Note: Common colds and menstruation are not considered valid reasons for extensions
